byline.contributor: Yufan Huang contributed research from Beijing.

abstract: China and Russia will hold joint military exercises in Mediterranean in May 2015, further sign of deepening ties between the two countries.
lead_paragraph: The announcement of joint military exercises was a further sign of deepening ties between China and Russia, and of the Chinese Navy’s increasing ambitions.

headline.main: Chinese and Russian Navies to Hold Joint Drills in Mediterranean
headline.print_headline: China and Russia to Hold Mediterranean Exercises

snippet: The announcement of joint military exercises was a further sign of deepening ties between China and Russia, and of the Chinese Navy’s increasing ambitions.
